00038 #include "egs_planes.h"
00039 #include "egs_input.h"
00040 
00041 //string XProjector::type = "EGS_Xplanes";
00042 //string YProjector::type = "EGS_Yplanes";
00043 //string ZProjector::type = "EGS_Zplanes";
00044 //string Projector::type = "EGS_Planes";
00045 const string EGS_PLANES_LOCAL xproj_type("EGS_Xplanes");
00046 const string EGS_PLANES_LOCAL yproj_type("EGS_Yplanes");
00047 const string EGS_PLANES_LOCAL zproj_type("EGS_Zplanes");
00048 const string EGS_PLANES_LOCAL proj_type("EGS_Planes");
00049 
00050 string EGS_PlaneCollection::type = "EGS_PlaneCollection";
00051 
00052 EGS_PlaneCollection::EGS_PlaneCollection(int Np, const EGS_Float *pos,
00053     const EGS_Vector *norm, const string &Name) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name) {
00054     if( Np < 2 ) egsFatal("EGS_PlaneCollection::EGS_PlaneCollection: "
00055          " you nead at least 2 planes\n");
00056     np = Np; nreg=np-1;
00057     planes = new EGS_Planes* [np];
00058     for(int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00059         planes[j] = new EGS_Planes(1,&pos[j],"",
00060                 EGS_Projector(norm[j],proj_type)); planes[j]->ref();
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00064 EGS_PlaneCollection::~EGS_PlaneCollection() {
00065     egsWarning("Deleting ~EGS_PlaneCollection at 0x%x\n",this);
00066     for(int j=0; j<np; j++) if( !planes[j]->deref() ) delete planes[j];
00067     delete [] planes;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void EGS_PlaneCollection::printInfo() const {
00071     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo(); int j;
00072     egsInformation("  plane positions: ");
00073     for(j=0; j<np; j++) egsInformation("  %g ",planes[j]->position(0));
00074     egsInformation("  \nplane normals: ");
00075     for(j=0; j<np; j++) {
00076         EGS_Vector a = planes[j]->normal();
00077         egsInformation("  (%g,%g,%g) ",a.x,a.y,a.z);
00078     }
00079     egsInformation("\n=====================================================\n");
00080 }

00082 extern "C" {
00083 
00084 EGS_PLANES_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00085     string type; int err = input->getInput("type",type);
00086     if( err ) {
00087         egsWarning("createGeometry(planes): missing type key\n");
00088         return 0;
00089     }
00090     EGS_Float first; vector<EGS_Float> thick; vector<int> nthick;
00091     vector<EGS_Float> pos;
00092     int err_first = input->getInput("first plane",first);
00093     int err_thick = input->getInput("slab thickness",thick);
00094     int err_nthick = input->getInput("number of slabs",nthick);
00095     if( !err_first && !err_thick && !err_nthick ) {
00096         if( thick.size() != nthick.size() || !thick.size() ) {
00097             egsWarning("createGeometry(planes): number of 'slab thickness' and"
00098              "\n    'number of slabs' inputs must be the same and not zero\n");
00099             egsWarning("  got %d and %d inputs --> input ignored\n",
00100                     thick.size(),nthick.size());
00101         }
00102         else {
00103             pos.push_back(first); int j=0;
00104             for(int i=0; i<thick.size(); i++) {
00105                 for(int l=0; l<nthick[i]; ++l)
00106                     pos.push_back(pos[j++]+thick[i]);
00107             }
00108         }
00109     }
00110     if( !pos.size() ) {
00111         err = input->getInput("positions",pos);
00112         if( err ) {
00113             egsWarning("createGeometry(planes): missing/wrong 'positions' "
00114              "input and missing/wrong multiple plane input\n");
00115             return 0;
00116         }
00117     }
00118     EGS_BaseGeometry *g;
00119     if( type == "EGS_Xplanes" ) g = new EGS_PlanesX(pos,"",
00120             EGS_XProjector(xproj_type));
00121     else if( type == "EGS_Yplanes" ) g = new EGS_PlanesY(pos,"",
00122             EGS_YProjector(yproj_type));
00123     else if( type == "EGS_Zplanes" ) g = new EGS_PlanesZ(pos,"",
00124             EGS_ZProjector(zproj_type));
00125     else if( type == "EGS_Planes" ) {
00126         vector<EGS_Float> a;
00127         err = input->getInput("normal",a);
00128         if( err || a.size() != 3 ) {
00129             egsWarning("createGeometry(planes): missing/wrong normal input\n");
00130             return 0;
00131         }
00132         g = new EGS_Planes(pos,"",EGS_Projector(EGS_Vector(a[0],a[1],a[2]),
00133                     proj_type));
00134     }
00135     else if( type == "EGS_PlaneCollection" ) {
00136         vector<EGS_Float> a;
00137         err = input->getInput("normals",a);
00138         if( err || a.size() < 6 ) {
00139             egsWarning("createGeometry(planes): missing/wrong normal input\n");
00140             return 0;
00141         }
00142         int np = a.size()/3;
00143         if( np != pos.size() ) {
00144             egsWarning("createGeometry(planes): number of plane normals (%d)\n"
00145                " is not the same as number of plane positions (%d) for a"
00146                " plane collection\n",np,pos.size());
00147             return 0;
00148         }
00149         EGS_Float *p = new EGS_Float [np];
00150         EGS_Vector *normal = new EGS_Vector [np];
00151         for(int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00152             p[j] = pos[j]; normal[j] = EGS_Vector(a[3*j],a[3*j+1],a[3*j+2]);
00153         }
00154         g = new EGS_PlaneCollection(np,p,normal);
00155     }
00156     else {
00157         egsWarning("createGeometry(planes): unknown type %s\n",type.c_str());
00158         return 0;
00159     }
00160     g->setName(input);
00161     g->setMedia(input);
00162     g->setLabels(input);
00163     return g;
00164 }
00165
